item.title: WE'RE BACK!!!: New Year; Same Ol' Canada [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ January 11, 2023
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew are back for their first episode of 2024 to talk about the insane hypocrisy of our elected officials and law enforcement officers. Apparently, there are two Canadas, with two sets of rules: one for the woke deconstructors of Canadian culture and the political and cultural elites, and then another for patriotic Canadians. 

[Segment 1] - German Farmers Fight Back!:
"RHF Farmer Revolt Against Socialist Policies" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2024/01/08/rhf-farmer-revolt-socialist;
Farmer's Protest Video Tweet by Peter Sweden | Twitter: https://twitter.com/PeterSweden7/status/1744848990548722129;

[Segment 2] - Protest Double-Standards:
Toronto Police Deliver Coffee to Hamas Supporters | Twitter: https://twitter.com/DrJacobsRad/status/1743718922770133356;
"Pro-Palestinians Disrupt Skating Party as Olivia Chow Calls Protest 'Democracy in Action'" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/pro-palestinians-disrupt-skating-party-as-olivia-chow-calls-protest-democracy-in-action;
"Toronto Police Serve Coffee to Agitators Calling for the Death of Israel as They Occupy Bridge in Jewish Neighborhood" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/toronto-police-serve-coffee-to-agitators-calling-for-the-death-of-israel-as-they-occupy-bridge-in-jewish-neighborhood;
"Consumer Price Index, December 2022" | Statistics Canada: https://www150.statcan.gc.ca/n1/daily-quotidien/231219/dq231219c-eng.htm?HPA=1&indid=4098-1&indgeo=0;

[Segment 3] - Arresting Journalists in Canada: Same Deal Different Parties:
"Rebel News' David Menzies Brutally Arrested for Scrumping Freeland" | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/rebel_news_david_menzies_brutally_arrested_for_scrumming_freeland;
"Truly Frightening and Deeply Wrong" | Western Standard: https://www.westernstandard.news/opinion/giesbrecht-truly-frightening-and-deeply-wrong/51517;
Menzies Arrested at Lantsman Rally by Rebel News | YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/embed/7K_YzTTCtwc;
"Rebel News' David Menzies Arrested by RCMP" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/politics/rebel-news-david-menzies-rcmp-arrest;
